summary: 2 small BAT Files for paying annoying bounties of up to 5 OR up to 1,000 gold.
descriptionHtml:
I created these BAT files because I have this recurring $5 bounty that pops up constantly for no reason that I can figure...possibly due to stolen good or some unique item?? Anyhow, simply place the BAT files in your SKYRIM>DATA folder or use NMM. Then open your in game console with the ~ key and type either \"BAT Pay5Bounty\" for adding 5 gold pieces to your stash of gold and paying ALL known factions bounties up to $5 OR type \'BAT PayBounty\" for paying bounties of up to $1,000 to ALL factions. Any amount over what each BAT file supplies for gold will be supplied by you so keep this in mind when using it.

If you like this MOD please ENDORSE it and feel free to check out my other MODs 
Follow me on FACEBOOK Six6StarStudios

My Other Mods:

author: Six6Star
